means: 到这程度，到这地步，这么

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些连接副词均有"因此，所以"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: accordingly, consequently, hence, so, therefore, thus
means: accordingly ：书面用词，强调根据某种原因而得出的结果，其前可用冒号或分号，但不用逗号。
consequently ：正式用词，侧重符合逻辑的结果。
hence ：较正式用词，指接下来的东西是理所当然的必需的东西，但强调其重要性。
so ：用于比较随便的场合，口语中多用。
therefore ：通常指引出一个推断出的必然结论。
thus ：多用于书面语中，可与therefore换用。

sentence.Network_en: Thus far, the two prime ministers have achieved no concrete results.
sentence.Network_cn: 到目前为止，两位首相还没有取得实质性成果。

sentence.Network_en: He had thus far succeeded in fending off my conversational sallies.
sentence.Network_cn: 他迄今为止一直不为我说的俏皮话所动。

sentence.Network_en: Jimmy is adopted and thus unrelated to Beth by blood.
sentence.Network_cn: 吉米是被收养的，因此和贝丝没有血缘关系。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字典中因字的解释 ... (1) 于是,就[ then] (2) 因而[ thus;as a result] (2) 同本义[ mat;cushi on].
高中英语单词表 ... Tibet n. (中国地名)西藏 thus ad. 如此；像这样；于是；因此 Thursday (名)星期四.
捣乱心境预防机制从而(Thus)失控(Out of control)。那些刻在椅子后的爱情，会不会像水泥上的花朵，开出没有的风，寂寞的森林．我 …
生活大爆炸第一季第一集剧本(中英文) - 豆丁网 ... angle： 角度 thus： 如此,这样 discourage： 阻碍.

list.abs: wed 周三thu 周四fri 周五
thuringite 鳞绿泥石thus far 迄今thwartship 横过船的
关于thus的用法... ... as thus 这样, 因此, 这样一来 thus far 至今, 于今, 到现在为止, 到此为止 thus much 这么多; 到这里为止.

encyclopedia.content: adv.【正式】 1. 如此，这样，以此方式 例： The new machines will work faster,thus reducing our costs. 新机器运转的速度会更快，可以降低成本。 Thus the question was finally settled. 这个问题最终就这样解决了。 Its people were thus reduced to slavery. 就这样， 它的人民都沦为奴隶了。 Italy had thus practically declared her independence. 意大利几乎就是这样宣告独立了。 2. 到如此程度 3. 因此，从而 4.thus

entry.def: You use thus to show that what you are about to mention is the result or consequence of something else that you have just mentioned.

example.ex: Neither of them thought of turning on the lunch-time news. Thus Caroline didn't hear of John's death until Peter telephoned...
example.tran: 两个人谁也没有想到打开电视看午间新闻，所以直到彼得打来电话，卡罗琳才得知约翰的死讯。

example.ex: Even in a highly skilled workforce some people will be more capable and thus better paid than others.
example.tran: 就算是在技术高度熟练的劳动者中，也会有人能力更强，因此，薪水也就更高。

entry.def: If you say that something is thus or happens thus you mean that it is, or happens, as you have just described or as you are just about to describe.

example.ex: Joanna was pouring the drink. While she was thus engaged, Charles sat on one of the bar-stools...
example.tran: 乔安娜正在倒酒。就在她正忙的当儿，查尔斯坐在了一张酒吧凳子上。

example.ex: Martin helped his father dig the water gardens out by hand. Thus he discovered his interest in gardening.
example.tran: 马丁亲手帮他父亲修建起了水景园，就这样对园艺产生了兴趣。

means.word_mean: 1. an aromatic gum resin obtained from various Arabian or East African trees; formerly valued for worship and for embalming and fumigation
1. (used to introduce a logical conclusion) from that fact or reason or as a result;

sentences.sentence: "the eggs were fresh and hence satisfactory"
"it is late and thus we must go"
"the witness is biased and so cannot be trusted"
"set up the pieces thus"; (`thusly' is a nonstandard variant)

auth_sentence.content: The galactic center thus attracts both gas and stars.
auth_sentence.res_content: The galactic center thus attracts both gas and stars.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The galactic center thus attracts both gas and stars.

auth_sentence.content: Thus gravitation appears as a purely quantum mechanic phenomen.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thus gravitation appears as a purely quantum mechanic phenomen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thus gravitation appears as a purely quantum mechanic phenomen.

auth_sentence.content: Thus special relativity is predicting nonsense in this respect.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thus special relativity is predicting nonsense in this respect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thus special relativity is predicting nonsense in this respect.

Sentence.sentence: Thus integrity must be one of our most important goals.
Thus talking came first;writing is just a craft that came along later.
Thus traumatized (受到创伤) the economy might have gone into a free fall ending in depression.
Hospital workers in at least one case deserted their workplace in panic, thus halting the administering of potentially unclean disease spreading injections, but Ebola has not disappeared.

means.word_mean: 以此方式, 如此, 这样

sentences.en: Thus the question was finally settled.
sentences.cn: 这个问题最终就这样解决了。

sentences.en: Its people were thus reduced to slavery.
sentences.cn: 就这样, 它的人民都沦为奴隶了。

sentences.en: Italy had thus practically declared her independence.
sentences.cn: 意大利几乎就是这样宣告独立了。

jushi.english: It was thus worded,“visitors welcome at any time.”
Industries thrive where coal abounds; thus you will find coal mines and many factories side by side.
jushi.chinese: 多煤的地方工业兴盛,因此你可以见到煤矿和许多工厂并立着。

jushi.english: Thus the question was finally settled.
jushi.chinese: 这个问题最终就这样解决了。
